text: E fo, Kraisɨn adarazir garir gumazir dapanim, a Godɨn ingangaribar garir gumazim. Kamaghɨn amizɨ a deraghvɨra daru, a gumazamizibar damazimɨn deraghvɨra ikɨ, a kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ suam, a ziar ekiam inisɨ me gativagh men ganam. Egh a zuamram anɨngaghan markɨ. Egh dɨpar onganir avɨribar aman markɨ. Egh a tintinibar gumazibav soghan markɨ, egh a ua baghɨvɨra dagɨar avɨriba inisɨ, nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
